entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:23 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 01:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow squalls. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow squalls and flurries at times heavy changing to flurries near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
